verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Remain in Me
Remain in Me
Because apart from Me
You can do nothing
Remain in Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am the Vine
You are the branches
Remain in Me
I am the Vine
You are the branches
Stay here with Me
